1_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS.body: If you want to go *really* light weight try [Alpine Linux](https://alpinelinux.org/). Their repos have both [mpv](https://pkgs.alpinelinux.org/package/v3.5/community/x86_64/mpv) and [firefox-esr](https://pkgs.alpinelinux.org/package/v3.5/community/x86_64/firefox-esr).
